CustomField.description: -Work with Warehouse team and vendors to facilitate the installation, maintenance and upkeep of the cctv/temperature/humidity (“the facilities”) control in the warehouse. -Monitor the facilities through reports and troubleshoot/diagnose faulty units with the Warehouse team -Constant update of Facilities floorplan to ensure it is up to date
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Work with the Warehouse team and vendors to facilitate the installation, maintenance and upkeep of the CCTV & temperature/humidity control in the warehouse. -Monitor the facilities through reports and troubleshoot/diagnose faulty units with the Warehouse team -Constant update of Facilities floorplan to ensure it is up to date
CustomField.label: Facilities Management
